type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.maven.tasks.AbstractPublishToMaven
type.description:
Base class for tasks that publish a org.gradle.api.publish.maven.MavenPublication.
(since 2.4)

method.name: getPublication
method.description:
The publication to be published.

returns:The publication to be published

method.name: setPublication
method.description:
Sets the publication to be published.
param:publication The publication to be published

property.name: publication
property.description:
The publication to be published.

returns:The publication to be published
